resources.string: Q1.Vedanta and Foxconn signed memorandums of understanding (MoUs) with the which State government to set up a semiconductor manufacturing facility with an investment of Rs. 1.54-lakh crore?
Q2.\'Early Intervention Centre-Prayas\' inaugurated at Army Hospital in which city?
Q3.Lok Sabha Speaker Om Birla and Minister of State for Defence Ajay Bhatt have inaugurated the National Defence MSME Conclave and Exhibition in which city?
Q4.Ministry of Ports,Shipping and Waterways is building the National Maritime Heritage Complex at which city?
Q5.Who will be taking over as the Attorney General(AG) of India from 1 October,after the current AG KK Venugopal?
